pullRequest.title: Removed reports_read_access and reports_full_access
pullRequest.bodyText:
opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security pull request intake form
Please provide as much details as possible to get feedback/acceptance on your PR quickly
Removed reports_read_access and reports_full_access
Reason: Reporting is releasing only in-context menu download in 1.11
reports_read_access and reports_full_access are not required for in-context menu download


Category: (Enhancement, New feature, Bug fix, Test fix, Refactoring, Maintenance, Documentation)
Limit feature for release


Github Issue # or road-map entry, if available:
NA


Description of changes:
Removed reports_read_access and reports_full_access


Why these changes are required?
Reporting is releasing only in-context menu download in 1.11
reports_read_access and reports_full_access are not required for in-context menu download.
Having these 2 extra unreleased role may confuse the users.


What is the old behavior before changes and new behavior after changes? (Please add any example/logs/screen-shot if available)
reports_read_access and reports_full_access are available to user for assigning to user.


Testing done: (Please provide details of testing done: Unit testing, integration testing and manual testing)
Integration testing on Reporting plugin
Unit testing on security plugin (mvn test)


TO-DOs, if any: (Please describe pending items and provide Github issues# for each of them)
NA


Is it backport from master branch? (If yes, please add backport PR # and commits #)
NA


By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

commit.message:
Removed reports_read_access and reports_full_access

Reason: Reporting is releasing only in-context menu download in 1.11

nodes.bodyText:
I believe each individual permission like 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/create' ( pattern:  'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/*' )  is no longer defined.
Otherwise one can still create its own custom role with these permission to use this feature.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -69,27 +69,3 @@ reports_instances_read_access:
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'
-
-# Allows users to read and download Reports and Report-definitions

nodes.bodyText: These "cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/* " and "cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/* " are still present in https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security-kibana-plugin/pull/657 ..
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -69,27 +69,3 @@ reports_instances_read_access:
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'
-
-# Allows users to read and download Reports and Report-definitions
-reports_read_access:
-  reserved: true
-  cluster_permissions:
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/get'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/list'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'
-
-# Allows users to all Reports functionality
-reports_full_access:
-  reserved: true
-  cluster_permissions:
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/create'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/update'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/on_demand'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/delete'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/get'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/list'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
